attributes.action: not increase the tax burden on the disabled with low incomes by removing the 10% rate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many disabled people on small disability pensions benefit from the 10% income tax rate - their incomes are that low.
Under the new income tax regime outlined in the Budget they will end up paying more income tax in order to subsidise those on much higher incomes who will be receiving a 2% tax cut on the major portion of their income. Redistribution of wealth from the disabled on low incomes to the relatively well off is unacceptable in the 21st century.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
